channel.title: I need some help plz
channel.description:
when i run the silabsoft client i get this... C:\Documents and Settings\Owner\Desktop\server>JAVA -Xmx500m -jar client .jar 0 0 highmem members 0 'JAVA' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file.
C:\Documents and Settings\Owner\Desktop\server>pause Press any key to continue . . .
and yes i am useing java 6. i just need the directions after start>controllpannel...
all help is greatly appreciated :)

item.title: I need some help plz
item.dc:creator: @dad9000 dad9000
item.description:
@dad9000 wrote:

OK, i have the same problem when i try to run silab client, but unfortunately changing the enviremont variables doesn’t do anything for me, but i will tell you what to do anyway. First go to start>control pannel>than click View System Information>than click Advanced>than click Enviremont Variables>than under User Variables click new>than go to chapter 7 of how to make a server to stop the questions tutorial and find out the rest.

Read full topic
